Name: ``timestamp``
Description: (float) Unix timestamp associated with the observation, corresponding approximately to its start time.

Name: ``duration``
Description: (float, seconds) Approximate length of observation, in seconds.

Name: ``start_time``
Description: (float, seconds) Unix timestamp of observation start.

Name: ``stop_time``
Description: (float, seconds) Unix timestamp of observation end.

Name: ``n_samples``
Description: (int) Number of samples in the detector timestreams.
